EmailTemplate.name: DesignExecutionWaiver Approval Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: ***GLOBALFOUNDRIES Confidential***: ASIC {!Waivers__c.Waiver_Type__c} Waiver for {!Waivers__c.Part_name__c} is {!ApprovalRequest.Status}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello Please fill Waiver applied quality level as P level Only/All before approvalStatus: {!Waivers__c.Approval_Status__c}Requestor: {!$User.FirstName}Requested Date: {!Waivers__c.Date_requesting_the_waiver__c} Waiver Need Date: {!Waivers__c.Waiver_need_date__c} Company: {!Waivers__c.Company__c} Opportunity Control Number: {!Waivers__c.Opportunity_Control_Number__c}Option Control Number: {!Waivers__c.Option_Control_Number__c}Design System: {!Waivers__c.Design_System__c} Document RIT Type: {!Waivers__c.Document_RIT_Type__c} Library Version: {!Waivers__c.Library_version__c} To:{!Waivers__c.To__c} CC: {!Waivers__c.CC__c} Tree: {!Waivers__c.Tree__c} Waiver For Type: {!Waivers__c.Waiver_Type__c} Section: {!Waivers__c.Section__c} Checked Being Reviewed: {!Waivers__c.Check_being_reviewed__c} Waiver applied quality level:{!Waivers__c.Waiver_Applied_to_with_values_as_below__c} Exact Error Or Warning Statement: {!Waivers__c.Exact_error_or_warning_statement__c} Request Justification: {!Waivers__c.Justification__c} Additional Comments: {!Waivers__c.Comments__c} Approval Comments: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}{!Waivers__c.Link}
